name: The rebirth of Kingdom Lo
description:
"The rebirth of Kingdom Lo" is a game developed by さんかっけい, including maps, music, characters, and storytelling, created by a single person.

In the game, you will play as a kemono prince who shoulders the mission of re-birthing the royal family and the kingdom in the upcoming coming-of-age ceremony.

You will cultivate the heirs of the kingdom with six princesses, carefully choose your conversations with them to gain their acceptance.

■CG



The game content is presented in a dialogue-style storytelling, where you will interact with characters and scenes on the map. interact with the princesses to unlock six animated CGs.

The game also includes a small amount of puzzle, playing on pixel art maps.■Map/h2]
